Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, approaching the southwestern shopping areas.
Room.LongDescription: Nagaritha Drive is directly to the north of this point. To the east, you can see a large banner which reads "Dangerous Destinations: Guide to the Universe." The entrance appears to be around the corner off of Nagaritha Drive. There seems to be a bit of a ruckus towards the south.
